text: Villars-sous-Champvent was a municipality of the district Jura-Nord vaudois in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. The former municipalities of Essert-sous- Champvent and Villars-sous-Champvent merged on 1 January 2012 into the municipality of Champvent.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 21 December 2011 == References == ==Other websites== Category:2010s disestablishments in Switzerland Category:2012 disestablishments in Europe Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Villars-sous-Champvent
